page.title: 15EMPLOYMENT AROUND CRICK
page.content: We sent out a questionnaire to find out about employment in Crick.Of the 130 that came back we gathered the following information. 63.35% of the employed people were men,31.30% women and only 5.35% were teenagers. A lot of people had professions; we were surprised at the number of men in this category. Services came very close, then Manufacturing followed by Technology,Storage, Land and our "Any other Job" category which held everything from Lorry driver and builder to clerical secretary. 40 people worked in Crick and 90 worked elsewhere. We have not been able to find out what % of people are unemployed but we don't believe it to be very high in this area.
